pkgmetadata.longdescription: Black Chocobo is a Free Software (gplv3) FF7 save game editor written in Qt. Available for Windows, Linux + Mac Os. A Full Featured Save Editor, Black Chocobo contains All The features you would expect. Black Chocobo can open and write both PC and PSX save game formats as well as saves for most emulators. Also Supports Converting Save Formats to PC or PSX. With it you can even export your ps3 saves.
